enchantment.simple_enchantments.butcheri: Deals extra Damage to Pig type mobs
enchantment.simple_enchantments.crushing: Break cobwebs and berry bushes by walking through them.
enchantment.simple_enchantments.fleeting: Temporarily increases Speed when you take damage.
enchantment.simple_enchantments.hail.des: Inflicts freeze on hit. Deals damage at end of freeze.
enchantment.simple_enchantments.phoenix_: Grants immunity to being set on Fire.
enchantment.simple_enchantments.shocking: Chance to inflict Paralysis on hit. Nearby entites will also be Paralysed.
enchantment.simple_enchantments.soul_bre: Deal extra Damage based on target Max Health.
enchantment.simple_enchantments.spell_bl: Chance to gain a random temporary buff upon hitting an enemy.
